item.title: To what extent can I get Indian Veg Food in Boston
item.description: Unfortunately only 3-4% of citizens in the US are vegetarian. After rambling around nearby streets, I got to know veg stuff was obscured everywhere. Even Subway/McDonald's were no exception. So here is a dynamic N00Bs guide in becoming a Masterchef with vegetarian things available in Boston. Masala Khichidi with Kadhi Pizza toppings on bread P.S. Pizza base coss around 4$ for 2, bread is 1.6$ for a loaf. Pav Bhaji Pulao Cauliflower Chana(black) h3 { font-family: 'Great Vibes', Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #000; text-shadow: 4px 4px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.
